mapper.select: select id, pid, short_name, name, merger_name, level, pinyin, code, zip_code, first, lng, lat from sh_area where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into sh_area(pid, short_name, name, merger_name, level, pinyin, code, zip_code, first, lng, lat) values (#{pid}, #{shortName}, #{name}, #{mergerName}, #{level}, #{pinyin}, #{code}, #{zipCode}, #{first}, #{lng}, #{lat})

insert into sh_area(pid, short_name, name, merger_name, level, pinyin, code, zip_code, first, lng, lat) values
(#{entity.pid}, #{entity.shortName}, #{entity.name}, #{entity.mergerName}, #{entity.level}, #{entity.pinyin}, #{entity.code}, #{entity.zipCode}, #{entity.first}, #{entity.lng}, #{entity.lat})

insert into sh_area(pid, short_name, name, merger_name, level, pinyin, code, zip_code, first, lng, lat) values
(#{entity.pid}, #{entity.shortName}, #{entity.name}, #{entity.mergerName}, #{entity.level}, #{entity.pinyin}, #{entity.code}, #{entity.zipCode}, #{entity.first}, #{entity.lng}, #{entity.lat})
on duplicate key update pid = values(pid), short_name = values(short_name), name = values(name), merger_name = values(merger_name), level = values(level), pinyin = values(pinyin), code = values(code), zip_code = values(zip_code), first = values(first), lng = values(lng), lat = values(lat)
mapper.update:
update sh_area
pid = #{pid},
short_name = #{shortName},
name = #{name},
merger_name = #{mergerName},
level = #{level},
pinyin = #{pinyin},
code = #{code},
zip_code = #{zipCode},
first = #{first},
lng = #{lng},
lat = #{lat},
where id = #{id}
